title: Mechaism of A T P Synthase

content.prompt: Which of the following questions will best direct an investigation of the mechanism of ATP synthase?

choices.label: What is the source of the inorganic phosphate that is used to generate ATP from ADP?
Is the phosphorylation of ADP by ATP synthase dependent on the formation of a proton gradient?
Can ATP synthase use the energy released by phosphorylation of ADP to pump protons against a concentration gradient?
Can oxidative phosphorylation be uncoupled from the electron transport chain?

skill.text: 3.A: Identify or pose a testable question based on an observation, data, or a model.
